item.title: Pandas Time Span
item.description: Pandas time span represents a period of time, for example, one day, one month, or one year… It is also called period object. I do not use time span object very often, but it is one of four pandas objects related to datetime. So, I am writing a very brief introduction for time span. To create a time span object, we can use Period() method: pd.Period() The keyword argument freq specify the span of the time.
